M_Justification: Uses a Generative Adversarial Network as the core generative model.
A_Justification: Federated generative modeling without raw data sharing
E_Justification: Deployed on edge/IoT devices with decentralized sensing.
L_Justification: Trains locally on devices with federated coordination.
T_Justification: Operates during inference to score live inputs.

M_Justification: Used a diffusion model to learn and sample from the data distribution.

E_Justification: Runs in centralized cloud or data-center environments.
L_Justification: Trains without labels by modeling normal/data distributions.
T_Justification: Used at training time to enhance data or robustness.
